verses.name: Jeremiah 46:19
verses.text: O thou daughter dwelling in Egypt, furnish thyself to go into captivity: for Noph shall be waste and desolate without an inhabitant.

verses.name: Jeremiah 46:20
verses.text: Egypt is like a very fair heifer, but destruction cometh; it cometh out of the north.

verses.name: Jeremiah 46:21
verses.text: Also her hired men are in the midst of her like fatted bullocks; for they also are turned back, and are fled away together: they did not stand, because the day of their calamity was come upon them, and the time of their visitation.
